command: nodetool -u $CPS_ADMIN_USER -pw $CPS_ADMIN_PASSWORD disablebinary ; nodetool -u $CPS_ADMIN_USER -pw $CPS_ADMIN_PASSWORD disablethrift ; nodetool -u $CPS_ADMIN_USER -pw $CPS_ADMIN_PASSWORD drain ; PID=$(pidof java) && kill $PID && while ps -p $PID > /dev/null; do sleep 1; done
until cqlsh ${CASSANDRA_SEEDS} -u ${CASS_USERNAME} -p ${CASS_PASSWORD} --ssl -e 'select * from system_schema.keyspaces;' &> /dev/null; do sleep 5; echo 'waiting for roles to be created'; done;
initContainers.name: apigee-cassandra-user-readiness
